name: nfs1v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: nfxfr(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: The setvar ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.) Shorten nfs1v and ~ hbs1 combined. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 28-Jul-2022.)
